Class ServerCookie

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.delegates.ServerCookie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ServerCookie extends Object implements Serializable
Server-side cookie representation. Stolen from Tomcat.
See Also:
